spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Denizen of the Mist
entries: During its turn, the fog giant ignores the effects of {@spell fog cloud} spells cast by it or other allied fog giants.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks and casts {@spell fog cloud}.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 6d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Petty Tyrant {@recharge}
entries: The fog giant shouts bloodcurdling threats at the creatures that serve it. Each medium or smaller ally of the giant within 120 feet of it that can see or hear it can use its reaction to make a melee attack.
